message.content:
cs.GT, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.EC. 

The paper discusses the design of mechanisms for incentivizing truthful and prompt predictions, which is a topic in game theory (cs.GT) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The use of proper scoring rules to induce truthfulness is a common approach in machine learning (cs.LG) and statistics (cs.DS). The paper also discusses prediction markets, which are a topic in economics (cs.EC). Therefore, these five sub-categories are the most likely to be relevant to this paper.
